summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of $60.00 out of the general fund of the City of Seattle to pay the claim of Mr. And Mrs. J. S. Christy, for injuries to personal property, viz., Studebaker Roadster, state license no. 64403, occurring on Sixth Avenue South between the Pacific Coast Biscuit Company's premises and Holgate Street, on November 12, 1917, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
